Service Details: - Works in the crossroads between leading universities, progressive businesses and children at risk in poor and marginalized communities- Organizes strategic investments that empower people with the tools needed to bring about beneficial transformation in local communities, the marketplace and the world- Programs include Clean Water Project, Life Book Project, School Learning Resources Project, Community Health and Wellness program, Adopt a School Program, Community Learning Centres, Income Generation/Micro-loans Program, Student Sponsorship Program, Youth Internship Program, Entrance Cafe and Studio, University Leadership Courses, Leadership Development Camps and Corporate Social Responsibility Program
